mood: You are choosing clarity and responsibility in relationships, outgrowing the need for approval.
positives: ◦ Major career and financial boosts predicted for the day
◦ Outgrowing the need for external validation
◦ Strategic victory in emotional or financial contracts
cautions: ◦ Stagnant karmic impressions from past authority figures
◦ Challenges in organizing thoughts or routine matters
◦ Insomnia or anxiety caused by the Year of the Fire Horse
Vastu/Feng Shui/Lal Kitab Remedies: Offer black sesame seeds at a temple to release stagnant karmic burdens from authority figures
detailedPrediction: Relationships require clarity and conscious commitment today. While you are experiencing a internal shift toward self-direction, planetary alignments in your sign demand discipline and long-term planning. Use the day's energy to formalize emotional contracts. General Advice: Choose commitment consciously. Refine your ambition and ensure you aren't carrying burdens that don't belong to you.
